item.title: 华盛顿国家动物园与心爱的大熊猫说再见
item.description:
Washington's National Zoo bid a tearful farewell to its beloved trio of giant pandas on Wednesday as the long-serving goodwill ambassadors to the U.S. capital began a journey back to China that was announced earlier this year.翻译:华盛顿国家动物园周三含泪告别了心爱的三只大熊猫，长期担任驻美国首都的亲善大使开始了今年早些时候宣布的返回中国的旅程。

The bears - Mei Xiang, Tian Tian and their cub Xiao Qi Ji - hunkered down in crates made of steel and plexiglass that were lifted into a truck and then loaded into a Boeing 777F cargo plane dubbed "FedEx Panda Express." They left in the early afternoon from Dulles International Airport with a load of bamboo, apples and pears to munch on during the 19-hour, 9,000 mile flight.翻译:这些熊——“美香”、“甜甜”和它们的幼崽“小七吉”——蹲在钢和有机玻璃制成的板条箱里，这些板条箱被装上卡车，然后装进一架名为“联邦快递熊猫快递”的波音 777F 货机。下午早些时候，他们从杜勒斯国际机场出发，带着一大堆竹子、苹果和梨，在 19 小时、9,000 英里的飞行中享用。

The pandas, accompanied by three zookeepers, will travel to a reserve in China’s mountainous Sichuan province, where an estimated 1,800 pandas are still found in the wild, according to the National Zoo.翻译:据国家动物园称，这些大熊猫将在三名动物园管理员的陪同下前往中国山区四川省的一个保护区，那里估计仍有 1,800 只大熊猫在野外。

Zoo director Brandie Smith choked back tears at a brief ceremony ending more than a half century in which pandas have been residents.翻译:动物园园长布兰迪·史密斯（Brandie Smith）在一场简短的仪式上强忍着泪水，结束了大熊猫半个多世纪以来的生活。

"It's been a hard week, but ultimately our focus today is on the safe transport of these animals to China," she said.翻译:“这是艰难的一周，但最终我们今天的重点是将这些动物安全运输到中国，”她说。

"It's a moment of joy because this is one more step in 50 years of a successful giant panda conservation program and hopefully the beginning of 50 more years of successful giant panda conservation," she said.翻译:她说：“这是一个令人高兴的时刻，因为这是 50 年来大熊猫保护计划成功的又一步，也有望成为 50 年来大熊猫保护成功的开始。”

Mei Xiang, 25, and Tian Tian, 26, arrived at the National Zoo in 2000. Their first three cubs, born between 2005 and 2015, are thriving in China. Xiao Qi Ji - “Little Miracle” in English - was born three years ago, making his mother the oldest giant panda ever to give birth in the U.S.翻译:25 岁的美香和 26 岁的甜甜于 2000 年来到国家动物园。他们的前三只幼崽出生于 2005 年至 2015 年之间，目前在中国茁壮成长。 “小奇姬”——英文“Little Miracle”——三年前出生，这使得他的母亲成为美国有史以来出生年龄最大的大熊猫

Pandas live about 30 years under human care, but about 15-to-20 years in the wild, the zoo said on its website.翻译:动物园在其网站上称，大熊猫在人类照料下的寿命约为 30 年，但在野外的寿命约为 15 至 20 年。

The trio, made famous by the zoo's "Giant Panda Cam" with more than 100 million views, were part of a fading legacy in which giant pandas served as animal ambassadors.翻译:这三人因动物园的“大熊猫摄像机”而出名，观看次数超过一亿次，他们是大熊猫作为动物大使的日渐衰落的遗产的一部分。

It began in 1972, when the government of China presented two giant pandas as gifts to the U.S. after President Richard Nixon's historic Cold War visit to the communist country.翻译:它始于1972年，当时理查德·尼克松总统对这个共产主义国家进行历史性的冷战访问后，中国政府向美国赠送了两只大熊猫作为礼物。

Except for the initial gifts, giant pandas have been leased to U.S. zoos under contracts with the China Wildlife Conservation. In recent years, such contracts have not been extended.翻译:除了最初的礼物外，大熊猫还根据与中国野生动物保护协会的合同租给了美国动物园。近年来，此类合同并未延长。

The departure of Washington's three bears follows the return of pandas from Memphis and San Diego zoos, leaving only four giant pandas in the U.S. Those animals, residents of Georgia's Zoo Atlanta, are scheduled to return in 2024.翻译:华盛顿的三只熊离开后，孟菲斯和圣地亚哥动物园的大熊猫回归，美国只剩下四只大熊猫。这些动物是佐治亚州亚特兰大动物园的居民，计划于 2024 年回归。

It was not clear if or when the zoo will get more pandas.翻译:目前尚不清楚动物园是否或何时会获得更多熊猫。

Kimberly Blalock, a young visitor at the National Zoo on Tuesday, was among the last to see the pandas on display in Washington.翻译:周二，国家动物园的一位年轻游客金伯利·布拉洛克(Kimberly Blalock)是最后一批在华盛顿观看熊猫展示的人之一。

"I hope they can come back," she said. "I'm going to miss them and I want to hug them."翻译:“我希望他们能回来，”她说。 “我会想念他们，我想拥抱他们。”

Reporting by Kevin Fogarty and Kia Johnson in Washington, additional reporting and writing by Rich McKay in Atlanta; Editing by David Gregorio翻译:Kevin Fogarty 和 Kia Johnson 在华盛顿的报道，Rich McKay 在亚特兰大的补充报道和撰写；编辑：大卫·格雷戈里奥

item.title: 西方矿商以溢价瞄准中国稀土金属市场
item.description:
A handful of Canadian, German and Australian critical mineral explorers plan to command premium prices for key metals used in electric vehicles, promising quality and consistency in exchange for shifting reliance away from China, the dominant producer and price-setter.翻译:加拿大、德国和澳大利亚的少数关键矿产勘探商计划对电动汽车中使用的关键金属收取高价，承诺质量和一致性，以换取摆脱对主要生产国和价格制定者中国的依赖。

China controls 95% of the production and supply of rare earth metals, integral to manufacturing magnets for electric vehicles (EVs) and wind farms, and this monopoly has allowed China to dictate prices and stir turmoil among end users through export controls.翻译:中国控制着稀土金属 95% 的生产和供应，而稀土金属是制造电动汽车 (EV) 和风电场磁体不可或缺的组成部分，这种垄断使中国能够决定价格，并通过出口管制在最终用户中引发混乱。

Now, mining companies such as TSX-listed Aclara Resources (ARA.TO) and Australia's Ionic Rare Earths (IXR.AX) are discussing plans that may loosen China's grip on the critical minerals market, moving towards market-determined prices, company officials told Reuters.翻译:目前，多伦多证券交易所上市公司 Aclara Resources (ARA.TO)和澳大利亚 Ionic Rare Earths (IXR.AX) 等矿业公司正在讨论可能放松中国对关键矿产市场控制的计划，转向由市场决定价格，公司官员表示路透社。

Canadian miner Neo Performance Materials (NEO.TO) and Germany's Vacuumschmelze are also discussing similar plans, people familiar with the matter said. The two companies did not offer comment when reached by Reuters.翻译:知情人士称，加拿大矿业公司 Neo Performance Materials (NEO.TO)和德国 Vacuumschmelze 也在讨论类似的计划。当路透社联系到这两家公司时，他们没有发表评论。

"The controls on strategic minerals (by China) continues to escalate, it comes as no surprise if rare earths are next," said Ramon Barua, CEO of Aclara Resources, which is developing a heavy rare earth project in Chile.翻译:正在智利开发重稀土项目的阿克拉拉资源公司首席执行官拉蒙·巴鲁阿表示：“（中国）对战略矿产的控制持续升级，稀土成为下一个目标也就不足为奇了。”

Aclara is looking to mine heavy rare earth metal, such as dysprosium, and is in talks with original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) for a premium pricing as part of a long-term offtake deal.翻译:Aclara 正在寻求开采镝等重稀土金属，并正在与原始设备制造商 (OEM) 就溢价进行谈判，作为长期承购协议的一部分。

The previously unreported plans come as the miners seek to benefit from the Group of Seven (G7) countries' move to incentivize miners and automakers to produce and procure critical metals domestically or from friendly nations.翻译:此前未报道的计划出台之际，矿商正寻求从七国集团(G7) 国家激励矿商和汽车制造商在国内或从友好国家生产和采购关键金属的举措中受益。

In exchange, these miners expect end users to pay a premium.翻译:作为交换，这些矿工希望最终用户支付溢价。

They argue that geopolitical tensions between the West and China risk the reliable supply of rare earth minerals. If China persists with export restrictions, as it has with commodities like as germanium and graphite, supply could be further compromised.翻译:他们认为，西方和中国之间的地缘政治紧张局势危及稀土矿物的可靠供应。如果中国坚持出口限制，就像对锗和石墨等大宗商品那样，供应可能会进一步受到影响。

Rare earths, a group of 17 elements used in various products including EVs, wind turbines, and consumer electronics due to their magnetic and electronic properties, garnered renewed attention after Beijing last month announced export permit requirements for some graphite products from December to protect national security, citing national security concerns.翻译:稀土是由 17 种元素组成的一组元素，因其磁性和电子特性而被用于电动汽车、风力涡轮机和消费电子产品等各种产品中，在北京上个月宣布从 12 月起对某些石墨产品实施出口许可证要求以保护国家安全后，稀土再次受到关注。 ，以国家安全为由。

For instance, the current price of neodymium, used to make the most powerful magnet in the world, varies between $73 to $520 per kg and companies say ex-China prices could be 30% more than the current quoted price.翻译:例如，用于制造世界上最强大磁铁的钕目前的价格在每公斤 73 美元至 520 美元之间，公司表示，中国以外的价格可能比当前报价高出 30%。

Aclara's Barua said that Western supply of rare earth elements will not develop if it depends on Chinese prices.翻译:阿克拉拉的巴鲁亚表示，如果依赖中国的价格，西方的稀土元素供应就不会发展。

"The West will be able to supply environmentally responsible and traceable rare earths, but the cost structure is different to the Chinese and hence it comes at a premium," he said.

IRA LEVERAGE

The miners believe manufacturers will absorb extra costs due to new environmental, social and governance-related legislation and tax incentives like the U.S. Inflation Reduction Act and argue that a premium price is warranted for reliable and sustainably sourced rare earths that are key to the transition to cleaner energy.翻译:矿商们认为，由于新的环境、社会和治理相关立法以及美国通胀削减法案等税收激励措施，制造商将承担额外成本，并认为可靠和可持续采购的稀土价格溢价是有道理的，这是向稀土过渡的关键。更清洁的能源。

For any OEM, the quandary of differential pricing is about being able to judge a quantifiable value that paying higher price brings.翻译:对于任何 OEM 来说，差别定价的困境在于能否判断支付更高价格所带来的可量化价值。

"What we as OEMs want is a global level playing field, and that means having a transparent, sustainable and reliable pricing," Badrinath Veluri, chief specialist at Grundfos, an OEM based out of Denmark that manufactures water pumps that use rare earth magnets.翻译:“我们作为原始设备制造商想要的是一个全球公平的竞争环境，这意味着拥有透明、可持续和可靠的定价，”格兰富首席专家 Badrinath Veluri 说道。格兰富是一家总部位于丹麦的原始设备制造商，生产使用稀土磁体的水泵。

Veluri added that if any supplier is claiming that they bring value by charging higher prices, he wants to see the specific merits of that claim.翻译:韦鲁里补充说，如果任何供应商声称他们通过收取更高的价格来带来价值，他希望了解这种说法的具体优点。

"The price of any metal (rare earth or otherwise) that is coming from China or from western countries has the same pricing, so why should rare earth pricing be different?" Veluri asked.翻译:“来自中国或西方国家的任何金属（稀土或其他）的价格都是相同的，那么为什么稀土的定价应该不同呢？”维鲁里问道。

The discussion on pricing has come up often in the Rare Earth Industry Association, said Veluri, who is also the president of the global organization with partners representing the whole rare earth value chain.翻译:Veluri 表示，关于定价的讨论在稀土行业协会中经常出现。他也是该全球组织的主席，其合作伙伴代表了整个稀土价值链。

U.S.-based MP Materials (MP.N) and Australia's Lynas (LYC.AX), the world's two biggest rare earths companies outside of China, were not immediately available for comment.翻译:未能立即联系到中国以外全球最大的两家稀土公司美国 MP Materials (MP.N)和澳大利亚莱纳斯(LYC.AX)发表评论。

Developing rare earth mining projects can take decades, and investor risk aversion has derailed the viability of some projects outside of China. While Vietnam, Malaysia, and Myanmar offer alternatives to China, their final production remains distant.翻译:开发稀土开采项目可能需要数十年的时间，投资者的风险厌恶情绪已经破坏了中国境外一些项目的可行性。虽然越南、马来西亚和缅甸提供了中国的替代品，但它们的最终产量仍然遥远。

Companies have suggested pricing alternatives such as selling rare earth concentrates at half their cost of production plus capital cost, ensuring mines remain profitable. Another option is to cap prices at those offered by Chinese rare earth makers, protecting OEMs from drastic price fluctuations.翻译:公司提出了定价替代方案，例如以生产成本加资本成本的一半出售稀土精矿，以确保矿山保持盈利。另一种选择是限制中国稀土制造商提供的价格，保护原始设备制造商免受价格剧烈波动的影响。

The other option is taking into account the price offered by Chinese rare earth makers and putting a ceiling to it, so even if there is a 100% jump in rare earth prices, OEMs do not end up paying for those fluctuation.翻译:另一种选择是考虑中国稀土制造商提供的价格并设定上限，因此即使稀土价格上涨100%，原始设备制造商最终也不会为这些波动买单。

These mechanisms could boost the cost of an EV, which uses rare earth magnets in its motor, by at least 30% to 50%.翻译:这些机制可能会使电机中使用稀土磁铁的电动汽车的成本增加至少 30% 至 50%。

"Everything ultimately is about trade off," said Tim Harrison, managing director of Ionic Rare Earths. "If you want a product tied to sustainability metrics, minimizing carbon footprints etc, then obviously that is being delivered with cost and that needs to be reflected in the price that supply chain is prepared to pay," Harrison added.翻译:“一切最终都与权衡有关，”离子稀土公司董事总经理蒂姆·哈里森说。哈里森补充道：“如果你想要一种与可持续性指标、最大限度地减少碳足迹等相关的产品，那么显然这是有成本的，并且需要反映在供应链准备支付的价格中。”

"The OEMs probably won't pay a higher price for stuff that they buy in high volumes, such as lithium," said Flavio Volpe, president of Automotive Parts Manufacturers Association, the lobby group that represents Canada's OEM producers of parts and equipment.翻译:“原始设备制造商可能不会为大量购买的产品支付更高的价格，例如锂，”汽车零部件制造商协会主席弗拉维奥·沃尔普说，该协会是代表加拿大零部件和设备原始设备制造商生产商的游说团体。

"But for things like cobalt, copper, or rare earth metals there is a good strategic play to find with a mining partner." Volpe added.翻译:“但对于钴、铜或稀土金属等，与采矿合作伙伴合作是一种很好的战略选择。”沃尔普补充道。

Reporting by Divya Rajagopal Editing by Denny Thomas and Marguerita Choy翻译:迪维亚·拉贾戈帕尔 (Divya Rajagopal) 报道 丹尼·托马斯 (Denny Thomas) 和玛格丽塔·蔡 (Marguerita Choy) 编辑

item.title: 独家：中国当局要求平安控股碧桂园
item.description:
Chinese authorities have asked Ping An Insurance Group to take a controlling stake in embattled Country Garden (2007.HK), the nation's biggest private property developer, four people familiar with the plan said.翻译:四位知情人士称，中国当局已要求平安保险集团控股陷入困境的中国最大的私营房地产开发商碧桂园（2007.HK） 。

China's State Council, which is headed by Premier Li Qiang, has instructed the local government of Guangdong province, where both companies are based, to help arrange a rescue of Country Garden by Ping An, said two of the sources who have direct knowledge of the matter.翻译:两名直接了解情况的消息人士称，以李强总理为首的中国国务院已指示两家公司所在地广东省当地政府帮助安排平安对碧桂园的救助。事情。

A spokesperson for Ping An (601318.SS) said the company had not been approached by the government and denied the information reported by Reuters.翻译:中国平安（601318.SS）发言人表示，政府尚未与该公司接洽，并否认了路透社报道的信息。

Ping An has "not been asked by (the) Government to takeover Country Garden. We categorically deny this story. It is untrue," the company said in a statement to Reuters.翻译:该公司在给路透社的一份声明中表示，平安“没有被政府要求收购碧桂园。我们断然否认这个故事。这是不真实的”。

It reiterated its denial in a public statement after Reuters first published this report.翻译:在路透社首次发表这份报告后，它在一份公开声明中重申了其否认。

A Reuters spokesperson said: “We stand by our reporting.”翻译:路透社发言人表示：“我们坚持我们的报道。”

The insurer, which vies with China Life (601628.SS) for the title of the country's biggest insurance group by market value, declined to make its founder and chairman, Ma Mingzhe, available for an interview. Ma, who also uses the English first name Peter, did not respond to an emailed Reuters request for comment.翻译:这家与中国人寿（601628.SS）争夺中国市值最大保险集团称号的保险公司拒绝接受其创始人兼董事长马明哲的采访。马云也使用英文名彼得，他没有回复路透社通过电子邮件发出的置评请求。

China's State Council Information Office and the Guangdong local government did not respond to requests for comment. Country Garden declined to comment.翻译:中国国务院新闻办公室和广东地方政府没有回应置评请求。碧桂园拒绝置评。

Ping An's Hong Kong-listed shares finished 5.4% lower in heavy trade, wiping about $2.1 billion off its market value. Country Garden shares surged 12.2%, valuing the company at about $3 billion, and stocks of other Chinese developers also jumped.翻译:平安在香港上市的股票在激烈的交投中下跌 5.4% ，市值蒸发约 21 亿美元。碧桂园股价飙升 12.2%，该公司估值约为 30 亿美元，其他中国开发商的股价也大幅上涨。

A state-engineered rescue of Country Garden by Ping An would be one of the most significant interventions to date by authorities to support the cash-squeezed and highly indebted property sector, which accounts for one-quarter of China's economic activity and has sparked fears of a broader financial crisis.翻译:平安对碧桂园的国家计划救助将是迄今为止当局为支持现金紧张且负债累累的房地产行业而采取的最重大干预措施之一，该行业占中国经济活动的四分之一，并引发了人们的担忧更广泛的金融危机。

"If this is true, it will have a very significant positive impact on the property and capital markets," said Xu Tianchen, senior economist at the Economist Intelligence Unit.翻译:“如果这是真的，将对房地产和资本市场产生非常重大的积极影响，”经济学人智库高级经济学家徐天辰表示。

"Only equity injections, such as corporate takeovers or nationalisations, are likely to turn around the confidence of home buyers and investors and materially change the situation."

MITIGATING RISK

Authorities are keen that any risks posed by Country Garden's liquidity problems should not spill over to the wider economy, said three of the sources.翻译:其中三位消息人士表示，当局希望碧桂园的流动性问题带来的任何风险都不应蔓延到更广泛的经济领域。

While in China companies can rarely ignore a request from the central government, the three sources said Ping An has been asked to come up with details of the plan and will have leeway to negotiate terms of any deal.翻译:虽然在中国，企业很少会忽视中央政府的要求，但三位消息人士表示，平安已被要求提供该计划的细节，并将有余地来谈判任何交易的条款。

Talks between authorities and core Ping An leaders began in late August and are still at an early stage, said two of them.翻译:其中两位人士表示，当局与平安核心领导人之间的谈判于 8 月底开始，目前仍处于早期阶段。

Ping An has been asked to conduct due diligence on Country Garden, two sources also said, adding that authorities understood the insurer was a listed company answerable to shareholders.翻译:两位消息人士还表示，平安已被要求对碧桂园进行尽职调查，并补充说，当局了解该保险公司是一家对股东负责的上市公司。

A fifth person with knowledge of the matter said some talks between Ping An and the Guangdong local government about a rescue of Country Garden took place in September.翻译:第五位知情人士称，9月份中国平安与广东地方政府就救助碧桂园进行了一些会谈。

All sources declined to be identified due to the sensitivity of the matter.翻译:由于此事的敏感性，所有消息来源均拒绝透露姓名。

Discussions between Ping An and authorities are being led by officials in the financial markets department of the People's Bank of China (PBOC), which is the central bank, and include Country Garden, said two sources.翻译:两名消息人士称，平安与当局之间的讨论是由中国人民银行（中国人民银行）金融市场部官员主导的，其中包括碧桂园。

The National Financial Regulatory Administration (NFRA) is also involved in the talks, they added.翻译:他们补充说，国家金融监管局（NFRA）也参与了谈判。

Neither the PBOC nor the NFRA responded to Reuters requests for comment.翻译:中国人民银行和国家金融监管局均未回应路透社的置评请求。

Authorities want Ping An to take a stake of more than 50%, according to one person with direct knowledge and one person briefed on the plan.翻译:据一位直接知情人士和一位了解该计划的人士透露，当局希望平安持股超过 50%。

Country Garden's largest shareholder with a stake of about 52% is Yang Huiyan, chairperson and daughter of a co-founder. Reuters was not able to reach Yang for comment.翻译:碧桂园第一大股东为董事长、联合创始人之女杨惠妍，持股约52%。路透社未能联系到杨置评。

If Ping An were to become Country Garden's controlling shareholder, authorities would like it to inject capital in stages to ease the developer's liquidity problems, according to four sources.翻译:四位消息人士称，如果平安成为碧桂园的控股股东，当局希望其分阶段注资，以缓解开发商的流动性问题。

The property developer last month missed a deadline to pay a $15 million coupon and the market has deemed it to be in default on its offshore bonds which total some $11 billion.翻译:上个月，这家房地产开发商错过了支付 1500 万美元息票的最后期限，市场认为该公司拖欠了总额约 110 亿美元的离岸债券。

Country Garden has said it expects to be unable to meet all of its offshore debt obligations and hopes to seek a "holistic" solution to its difficulties.翻译:碧桂园表示，预计无法履行所有离岸债务，并希望寻求“全面”解决方案来解决其困难。

Chinese authorities are eager to make the proposed takeover a possible template for other financially troubled developers, two of the sources also said.

GUANGDONG SOLUTION

Authorities are keen for the Country Garden's liquidity problems to be resolved within Guangdong, three sources said. Ping An was a natural choice because it is based in Guangdong and has been a major Country Garden shareholder, according to two of the sources.翻译:三名消息人士称，当局希望碧桂园的流动性问题能够在广东境内得到解决。两位消息人士称，平安是一个自然选择，因为它总部位于广东，并且一直是碧桂园的主要股东。

Ping An said after Reuters first published this report that it no longer holds Country Garden shares. It held a 4.99% stake as of Aug. 11, according to Hong Kong stock exchange data.翻译:中国平安在路透社首次发布该报道后表示，其不再持有碧桂园股票。根据香港证券交易所数据，截至8月11日，该公司持有4.99%的股份。

A state-engineered takeover of one company by another is not without precedent in China. But there has not been one in the property sector since Beijing flagged measures in 2020 to tackle the industry's very high debt levels, triggering a liquidity crunch.翻译:国家策划的一家公司对另一家公司的收购在中国并非没有先例。但自北京在 2020 年宣布采取措施解决该行业极高的债务水平并引发流动性紧缩以来，房地产行业还没有出台任何措施。

Although many other Chinese property developers, including giant China Evergrande (3333.HK), have defaulted on their debt, policy steps have mostly concentrated on lowering mortgage rates and relaxing rules so that it is easier for people to buy homes.翻译:尽管包括巨头中国恒大（3333.HK）在内的许多其他中国房地产开发商都出现了债务违约，但政策措施主要集中在降低抵押贷款利率和放宽规定，以便人们更容易购房。

But in a sign that governmental authorities are willing to play a bigger role, China Vanke's (000002.SZ) top shareholder, state-owned Shenzhen Metro on Monday said it had prepared 10 billion yuan ($1.4 billion) worth of "market tools" to support the country's No. 2 developer.翻译:但万科(000002.SZ)的最大股东、国有深圳地铁周一表示，已准备了价值 100 亿元人民币（14 亿美元）的“市场工具”，这表明政府当局愿意发挥更大的作用。支持国家第二大开发商。

Country Garden had total liabilities of 1.4 trillion yuan ($190 billion) at the end of June. It has more than 3,000 projects under development nationwide.翻译:截至 6 月底，碧桂园的总负债为 1.4 万亿元人民币（1,900 亿美元）。全国在建项目超过3000个。

Ping An has been tapped by authorities as a rescuer for an ailing company before.翻译:平安此前曾被当局指派为一家陷入困境的公司的救助者。

It participated in state-guided aid for Peking University Founder Group in 2021 and 2022. Its main unit, Ping An Life, was part of a consortium that was involved in restructuring the group's debt and then the unit took 67% ownership of the reorganised company.翻译:2021年和2022年参与北大方正集团国家引导援助，其主体单位平安人寿是参与集团债务重组的财团成员，后持有重组后公司67%的股权。

($1 = 7.2846 Chinese yuan)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2846 人民币）

Reporting by Reuters staff; Editing by Anne Marie Roantree, Antoni Slodkowski, Don Durfee and Edwina Gibbs翻译:路透社工作人员的报道；编辑：Anne Marie Roantree、Antoni Slodkowski、Don Durfee 和 Edwina Gibbs

item.title: 美国议员希望拜登提高对中国制造汽车的关税
item.description:
A bipartisan group of U.S. lawmakers want the Biden administration to hike tariffs on Chinese-made vehicles and investigate ways to prevent Chinese companies from exporting to the United States from Mexico.翻译:美国两党议员小组希望拜登政府提高对中国制造的汽车的关税，并调查阻止中国公司从墨西哥向美国出口的方法。

Representative Mike Gallagher, a Republican who chairs a select committee on China, and the panel's top Democrat, Raja Krishnamoorthi and Michigan Representatives Haley Stevens and John Moolenaar urged U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai in a letter to boost the current 25% tariff on Chinese vehicles.翻译:中国问题特别委员会主席、共和党众议员迈克·加拉格尔(Mike Gallagher)、该委员会民主党领袖拉贾·克里希纳莫蒂(Raja Krishnamoorthi)以及密歇根州众议员黑利·史蒂文斯(Haley Stevens)和约翰·莫勒纳尔(John Moolenaar)在一封信中敦促美国贸易代表凯瑟琳·戴提高目前对中国汽车征收的25%关税。

"It is critical that tariffs on (Chinese) automobiles not only be maintained but also increased to stem the expected surge in (Chinese) imports," they wrote in the previously unreported letter seen by Reuters.翻译:他们在路透社看到的此前未报道的信中写道：“至关重要的是，不仅要维持对（中国）汽车的关税，还要提高关税，以遏制（中国）进口量的预期激增。”

USTR and the Chinese Embassy in Washington did not immediately respond to requests for comment. The 25% Chinese auto tariffs were imposed during the administration of then President Donald Trump and extended by the Biden administration.翻译:美国贸易代表办公室和中国驻华盛顿大使馆没有立即回应置评请求。 25%的中国汽车关税是在时任总统唐纳德·特朗普执政期间征收的，并由拜登政府延长。

The letter said the USTR should consider launching a new Section 301 investigation into Chinese vehicles "and the harm they pose to the American automotive industry and American workers and what actions should be taken to counter (China's) industrial strategy to dominate the global automobile market."翻译:信中称，美国贸易代表办公室应考虑对中国汽车发起新的301调查，“以及它们对美国汽车工业和美国工人造成的伤害，以及应采取哪些行动来对抗（中国）主导全球汽车市场的产业战略。” ”

The letter also said the United States "must also be prepared to address the coming wave of (Chinese) vehicles that will be exported from our other trading partners, such as Mexico, as (Chinese) automakers look to strategically establish operations outside of (China) to take advantage of preferential access to the U.S. market through our free trade agreements."翻译:信中还表示，美国“还必须准备好应对即将到来的从墨西哥等其他贸易伙伴出口的（中国）汽车浪潮，因为（中国）汽车制造商希望在（中国）之外战略性地建立业务。 ）通过我们的自由贸易协定利用进入美国市场的优惠待遇。”

Automakers in the United States have raised concerns about Chinese automakers.翻译:美国汽车制造商对中国汽车制造商表示担忧。

Alliance for Automotive Innovation CEO John Bozzella said in June proposed U.S. environmental regulations could let China gain "a stronger foothold in America’s electric vehicle battery supply chain and eventually our automotive market."翻译:汽车创新联盟首席执行官约翰·博泽拉（John Bozzella）6月表示，美国拟议的环境法规可以让中国“在美国电动汽车电池供应链乃至我们的汽车市场上获得更牢固的立足点”。

In September, the European Commission launched an investigation into whether to impose punitive tariffs to protect European Union producers against cheaper Chinese electric vehicle (EV) imports.翻译:9月，欧盟委员会启动了一项调查，调查是否征收惩罚性关税，以保护欧盟生产商免受更便宜的中国电动汽车（EV）进口的影响。

The lawmakers said the United States should work with allies "to impose a coordinated response that collectively dampens demand in our markets."翻译:议员们表示，美国应该与盟友合作“采取协调一致的应对措施，共同抑制我们市场的需求”。

The letter noted "many of the EVs exported from the PRC are made by Western brands, such as Tesla (TSLA.O), that have significant production capacity" in China.翻译:信中指出，“从中国出口的许多电动汽车都是由特斯拉（TSLA.O）等西方品牌制造的，这些品牌在中国拥有巨大的产能”。

Lawmakers noted some U.S. automakers are exporting Chinese-made vehicles to the United States, which they said underscores that the current tariff level on imported vehicles is insufficient.翻译:议员们指出，一些美国汽车制造商正在向美国出口中国制造的汽车，他们表示，这凸显出目前进口汽车的关税水平不够。

Reporting by David Shepardson; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama翻译:大卫·谢泼德森报道；编辑：野宫千津
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 羊绒衫、夹克吸引消费者，拉尔夫·劳伦 (Ralph Lauren) 实现第二季度目标
item.description:
Ralph Lauren (RL.N) on Wednesday beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter results as U.S. shoppers snapped up its pricey sweaters and jackets and China demand recovered steadily, defying a wider luxury industry slowdown.翻译:拉尔夫·劳伦 (Ralph Lauren ) (RL.N)周三公布的第二季度业绩超出了华尔街预期，原因是美国消费者抢购其昂贵的毛衣和夹克，而中国需求稳步复苏，无视奢侈品行业整体放缓的影响。

The company has been strengthening its direct-to-consumer (DTC) business, acquiring new, younger and less price-sensitive shoppers through its website and stores, amid weaker U.S. wholesale demand that has hit several global brands.翻译:该公司一直在加强其直接面向消费者（DTC）业务，通过其网站和商店吸引新的、年轻的、对价格不太敏感的购物者，因为美国批发需求疲软已经打击了多个全球品牌。

Customers are going after cotton and cashmere cable-knit sweaters, Oxford shirts, jackets and other popular collections, Ralph Lauren CEO Patrice Louvet said on an earnings call.翻译:Ralph Lauren 首席执行官 Patrice Louvet 在财报电话会议上表示，顾客正在追求棉质和羊绒绞花针织毛衣、牛津衬衫、夹克和其他流行系列。

"The consumer (is) really gravitating towards this sophisticated, casual, more elevated style ... They want to invest in pieces that are timeless, that they can wear beyond one specific season."翻译:“消费者确实被这种精致、休闲、更高级的风格所吸引......他们希望投资于永恒的单品，这样他们可以在一个特定的季节之后穿着。”

Ralph Lauren drew 1.3 million new customers to its DTC business, aiding a 6% jump in global DTC same-store sales in the second quarter though September.翻译:Ralph Lauren 的 DTC 业务吸引了 130 万新客户，帮助第二季度至 9 月份的全球 DTC 同店销售额增长了 6%。

"(Ralph Lauren) is a brand that the customer is loyal to ... so when they're (spending cautiously), they're likely to go to brands that they trust," said Jessica Ramírez, senior research analyst at Jane Hali & Associates.翻译:Jane Hali 高级研究分析师杰西卡·拉米雷斯 (Jessica Ramírez) 表示：“（Ralph Lauren）是客户忠诚的品牌……因此，当他们（谨慎消费）时，他们很可能会选择他们信任的品牌。”及联营公司。

The company's China business recovered steadily, with a more than 20% jump in sales, even as other luxury players such as LVMH (LVMH.PA) and parka maker Canada Goose (GOOS.TO) saw feeble demand.翻译:尽管LVMH (LVMH.PA)和派克大衣制造商Canada Goose (GOOS.TO)等其他奢侈品牌的需求疲软，但该公司的中国业务稳步复苏，销售额增长了 20% 以上。

Shares of Ralph Lauren rose 3% as better stock planning helped the Polo-shirts maker enter the holidays with a leaner inventory, ruling out the need for excessive promotions.翻译:Ralph Lauren 的股价上涨了 3%，因为更好的库存计划帮助这家 Polo 衫制造商在进入假期时库存减少，排除了过度促销的必要。

Ralph Lauren largely maintained its annual revenue outlook, but its forecast for third-quarter sales to grow 1-2% came in below market expectations, due to caution around wholesale demand.翻译:Ralph Lauren 基本上维持了年度收入预期，但由于对批发需求的谨慎态度，其对第三季度销售额增长 1-2% 的预测低于市场预期。

Net revenue in the second quarter rose more than 3% to $1.63 billion, beating analysts' average estimate of $1.61 billion, while adjusted per-share profit of $2.10 also surpassed expectations of $1.93.翻译:第二季度净营收增长超过3%，达到16.3亿美元，超过分析师平均预期的16.1亿美元，而调整后每股利润2.10美元也超过预期的1.93美元。

Reporting by Deborah Sophia in Bengaluru; editing by Milla Nissi and Shinjini Ganguli翻译:黛博拉索菲亚在班加罗尔的报道；米拉·尼西 (Milla Nissi) 和辛吉尼·甘古利 (Shinjini Ganguli) 编辑

item.title: 普京称赞俄罗斯与中国的“高科技”军事合作
item.description:
Summary:
  • Putin praises China cooperation
  • Meets close ally of Xi in Moscow
  • Says cooperation is to ensure strategic security
  • Zhang says China respects Putin
翻译:概括：
  • 普京赞扬中国合作
  • 在莫斯科会见习近平的亲密盟友
  • 称合作是为了保障战略安全
  • 张说中国尊重普京

President Vladimir Putin on Wednesday lauded what he described as important "high-tech" Russian military cooperation with China at a meeting in Moscow with a top Chinese general who is a close ally of President Xi Jinping.翻译:周三，俄罗斯总统普京在莫斯科会见一位中国高级将领，他是习近平主席的亲密盟友，他称赞俄罗斯与中国的重要“高科技”军事合作。

China and Russia declared a "no limits" partnership in February 2022 when Putin visited Beijing just days before he sent tens of thousands of troops into Ukraine, triggering the deadliest land war in Europe since World War Two.翻译:2022年2月，普京访问北京，几天前他向乌克兰派遣了数万名军队，引发了第二次世界大战以来欧洲最严重的地面战争，中国和俄罗斯宣布建立“无限制”伙伴关系。

Receiving General Zhang Youxia, vice chairman of China's Central Military Commission, and Russian Defence Minister Sergei Shoigu, Putin sent his best wishes to Xi, saying the two leaders had developed a good friendship and working relations.翻译:普京在会见中央军委副主席张又侠和俄罗斯国防部长绍伊古时向习近平主席致以良好祝愿，表示两国领导人发展了良好的友谊和工作关系。

"Russia and China are not building any military alliances along the lines of the Cold War," Putin told Zhang at his Novo-Ogaryovo residence outside Moscow, adding that the Russian-Chinese relationship was a stabilising force for the world.翻译:普京在莫斯科郊外的新奥加廖沃官邸对张说：“俄罗斯和中国不会沿着冷战的路线建立任何军事联盟。”他补充说，俄中关系是世界的稳定力量。

The United States casts China as its biggest competitor and Russia as its biggest nation-state threat while U.S. President Joe Biden argues that this century will be defined by an existential contest with between democracies and autocracies.翻译:美国将中国视为其最大的竞争对手，将俄罗斯视为其最大的民族国家威胁，而美国总统乔·拜登则认为，本世纪将由民主国家与独裁国家之间的生存竞争来定义。

Putin, who heads the world's biggest nuclear power, said military cooperation between Moscow and Beijing was increasing and focused on high-tech areas that would ensure strategic security.翻译:全球最大核国家领导人普京表示，莫斯科和北京之间的军事合作正在加强，并集中在确保战略安全的高科技领域。

"Of course, our cooperation, our contacts in the military and military-technical sphere are also becoming increasingly important, as for military-technical cooperation, here, of course, our work in high-tech spheres comes first," Putin said.翻译:普京说：“当然，我们在军事和军事技术领域的合作、接触也变得越来越重要，至于军事技术合作，当然，我们在高科技领域的工作是第一位的。”

"I mean space, including high-orbit groupings, I also mean modern and promising weapons which will certainly ensure the strategic security of both Russia and the People's Republic of China."翻译:“我指的是太空，包括高轨道群，我还指的是现代且有前途的武器，它们必将确保俄罗斯和中华人民共和国的战略安全。”

A bipartisan panel appointed by the U.S. Congress said last month that Washington must prepare for possible simultaneous wars with Moscow and Beijing by expanding its conventional forces, strengthening alliances and enhancing its nuclear weapons modernisation programme.翻译:美国国会任命的一个两党小组上个月表示，华盛顿必须通过扩大常规力量、加强联盟和加强核武器现代化计划，为可能与莫斯科和北京同时发生的战争做好准备。

Putin accused the United States of stoking tensions in Asia by trying to form military alliances, a reference to the "AUKUS" security alliance of the U.S., Australia and Britain.翻译:普京指责美国试图建立军事联盟，即美国、澳大利亚和英国的“AUKUS”安全联盟，从而加剧亚洲紧张局势。

"We see all this, and together with our friends, including, first of all, from the People's Republic of China, we react to it calmly, carefully, and strengthen our defence capability, including through joint naval and air exercises," Putin said.翻译:普京说：“我们看到了这一切，我们与我们的朋友，首先是中华人民共和国的朋友一起，冷静、谨慎地应对，并加强我们的防御能力，包括通过联合海空演习。” 。

Zhang told Putin through a translator that China respected Russia for its ability to withstand what the West casts as its most stringent sanctions every imposed on a major economy.翻译:张通过翻译告诉普京，中国尊重俄罗斯，因为俄罗斯有能力承受西方所称的对主要经济体实施的最严厉制裁。

"The Russian Federation, under your leadership, stubbornly stands in the face of Western sanctions, which shows that no difficulty bends you and Russia," Zhang said. "For this, the Chinese side expresses respect to you."翻译:张说：“在你的领导下，俄罗斯联邦在西方制裁面前顽强地站了起来，这表明没有任何困难可以让你和俄罗斯屈服。”对此，中方向你表示敬意。”

Zhang said that his delegation had come in order to implement important agreements and further strengthen bilateral military cooperation.翻译:张军表示，我代表团此次来是为了落实重要协议，进一步加强双边军事合作。

Reporting by Reuters Editing by Andrew Osborn翻译:路透社报道 安德鲁·奥斯本 编辑
item.author: Guy Faulconbridge

item.title: 浦和浦项队失利，亚冠卫冕之路受挫
item.description:
Urawa Red Diamonds' defence of their Asian Champions League title suffered another blow on Wednesday as the shorthanded Japanese side were dealt a 2-1 defeat by South Korea's Pohang Steelers.翻译:周三，浦和红钻队的亚冠卫冕之路再次遭受打击，这支人手不足的日本球队以 2-1 输给了韩国浦项制铁队。

Second half goals from Zeca and Kim In-sung, who scored in injury time after Urawa's Takahiro Akimoto had been sent off, allowed hosts Pohang to come back and take all three points following Jose Kante's 36th minute opener for Maciej Skorza's side.翻译:下半场泽卡和金仁成在浦和队的秋元贵宏被罚下场后在伤停补时阶段进球，帮助东道主浦项队在何塞·坎特为马切伊·斯科尔扎的球队在第36分钟首开纪录后全取三分。

The result, coupled with Wuhan Three Towns' surprise 2-1 loss against Hanoi FC, means Pohang have booked their place in the last 16 as Group J winners to leave Urawa chasing one of the runners-up berths in the next phase.翻译:加上武汉三镇队意外2-1不敌河内FC，浦项队以J组第一名的身份晋级16强，浦和队将在下一阶段争夺亚军席位。

Only the winners of each of the 10 groups across Asia are guaranteed to advance to the next phase, where they will be joined by the three best second-placed teams from each of the eastern and western halves of the confederation.翻译:只有亚洲10个小组的获胜者才能保证晋级下一阶段，与东、西半区各最好的三支第二名球队一起晋级。

Urawa are second in Group J on four points and level with Chinese side Wuhan, who they face next in a crucial clash at Saitama Stadium on Nov. 28.翻译:浦和队在 J 组积 4 分，与中国球队武汉队持平，他们将在 11 月 28 日在埼玉体育场举行的一场关键比赛中迎战中国队。

There was disappointment, too, for two-times champions Jeonbuk Motors as the South Koreans slipped to a shock 2-0 loss at the hands of Lion City Sailors in Group F.翻译:两届冠军全北汽车队也令人失望，韩国队在 F 组中以 2-0 惨败于狮城水手队。

Richario Zivkovic scored both goals for the Singaporean hosts, who move level with Jeonbuk on six points.翻译:里查里奥·日夫科维奇为东道主新加坡队打进两球，他们与全北队积六分并列平。

The pair trail leaders Bangkok United by four points after Totchtawan Sripan's side were held to a 1-1 draw by struggling Kitchee from Hong Kong.翻译:Totchtawan Sripan 的球队被来自香港的杰志队以 1-1 逼平，两支球队落后领先者曼谷联队 4 分。

Willen Mota put Bangkok in front with a spectacular strike from long range in the 27th minute before Kitchee goalkeeper Paulo Cesar saved Mahmoud Eid's second half penalty to stop the hosts doubling their advantage.翻译:第 27 分钟，威伦·莫塔 (Willen Mota) 的一脚精彩远射帮助曼谷取得领先，随后杰奇 (Kitchee) 门将保罗·塞萨尔 (Paulo Cesar) 扑出下半场马哈茂德·艾德 (Mahmoud Eid) 的点球，阻止主队扩大优势。

Jakob Jantscher capitalised for Kitchee, equalising in the 70th minute and the Hong Kong Premier League champions held on for a point despite seeing Poon Pui Hin sent off two minutes later.翻译:Jakob Jantscher为杰志队在第70分钟扳平比分，尽管潘沛轩在两分钟后被罚下，香港超级联赛冠军仍保住了一分。

Japan's Ventforet Kofu moved to the top of Group H with a comprehensive 4-1 win over Chinese Super League side Zhejiang FC, the second division outfit climbing over Melbourne City on goals scored.翻译:日本甲府文特森林队以4比1大胜中超球队浙江FC，以进球数超越墨尔本城队，晋级H组榜首。

Former Nigeria international Peter Utaka gave Kofu a 17th minute lead and goals from Masahiro Sekiguchi and Yoshiki Torikai sealed the points in the second half.翻译:前尼日利亚国脚彼得·乌塔卡在第17分钟帮助甲府取得领先，下半场关口正宏和鸟海芳树的进球锁定了比分。

Kofu go into pole position after Melbourne City squandered their position at the summit with a 1-0 loss at home against Buriram United, with Goran Causic scoring from the penalty spot four minutes from time.翻译:墨尔本城队主场0-1负于武里南联队，丢掉了榜首位置，甲府队获得杆位，戈兰·考西克在比赛结束后四分钟点球破门。

Reporting by Michael Church, editing by Pritha Sarkar翻译:迈克尔·丘奇 (Michael Church) 报道，普里莎·萨卡 (Pritha Sarkar) 编辑

item.title: 独家：苏里南部长希望在12月中旬之前与中国达成债务协议
item.description:
Summary:
  • Suriname hopes to reach deal with China rescheduling interest payments on debt beyond 2024 by mid-Dec.
  • Suriname owes Chinese creditors around $540 million
  • Suriname, China deal should align with what its other creditor agreements, foreign minister says
  • Suriname expects EXIM officials to visit to complete the deal by year-end
翻译:概括：
  • 苏里南希望在 12 月中旬之前与中国达成协议，重新安排 2024 年以后的债务利息支付。
  • 苏里南欠中国债权人约5.4亿美元
  • 苏里南外长表示，中国协议应与其其他债权人协议保持一致
  • 苏里南预计进出口银行官员将到访以在年底前完成交易

Suriname hopes to strike a deal with China by mid-December over rescheduling interest payments on its debt beyond 2024, its foreign minister told Reuters on Wednesday, the final piece in a push to restructure its international debt.翻译:苏里南外交部长周三对路透社表示，苏里南希望在 12 月中旬之前与中国就 2024 年以后债务利息支付的重新安排达成协议，这是其国际债务重组的最后一步。

The country wants to ensure interest payments do not balloon going forward after Suriname became the second country to default on its sovereign debt in the aftermath of the COVID pandemic in 2020, after Zambia.翻译:继赞比亚之后，苏里南成为 2020 年新冠大流行后第二个主权债务违约的国家，该国希望确保未来利息支付不会激增。

Suriname and China have taken bilateral debt negotiations on rolling over the current agreement beyond the end of next year as far as they can and are close to a deal, Albert Ramdin said in an interview in Beijing, adding that it was important the terms aligned with what Suriname had agreed with other creditors.翻译:阿尔伯特·拉姆丁在北京接受采访时表示，苏里南和中国已就尽可能将当前协议延期至明年年底后进行双边债务谈判，并接近达成协议，并补充说，重要的是这些条款与苏里南与其他债权人达成的协议。

"At the technical level, (the Chinese side) has reached the 'maximum', based on what the rules and procedures of the EXIM bank allow, which is why I am here: to convince them it's time to take this to the next level and see what can be done," Ramdin said.翻译:“在技术层面上，根据进出口银行的规则和程序，（中方）已经达到了‘最大限度’，这就是我来这里的原因：说服他们，是时候将此事提升到一个新的水平了。”看看能做些什么，”拉姆丁说。

"I think anything beyond that would require a policy decision at a higher level, somebody needs to take the loss," he added, but did not say whose decision that was on the Chinese side.翻译:他补充说：“我认为任何超出这一范围的事情都需要更高层面的政策决定，需要有人承担损失。”但他没有透露中方的决定是谁做出的。

Suriname owes Chinese creditors around $540 million, according to the Suriname Debt Management Office, of which close to $130 million is in arrears. The terms of the loans do not include any concessions, Ramdin said, meaning that China cannot seize any of its assets should the country continue to struggle with repayments.翻译:据苏里南债务管理办公室称，苏里南欠中国债权人约5.4亿美元，其中近1.3亿美元为欠款。拉姆丁表示，贷款条款不包括任何让步，这意味着如果中国继续面临还款困难，中国将无法扣押其任何资产。

"There are two remaining issues. One is the maturity rate - the term of the loan - as we need more time, so it fits within the debt sustainability framework of the International Monetary Fund... and the other is to seek a reduction in interest rate."翻译:“还有两个问题。一个是到期率——贷款期限——因为我们需要更多时间，所以它符合国际货币基金组织的债务可持续性框架……另一个是寻求减少利率。”

The former Dutch Colony desperately needs debt relief from creditors including the IMF, Paris Club, India, and China, whom it is struggling to repay, as its commodities exports have taken a hit with prices plunging globally and its reserves dried up as the cost of imported staples shot up during the pandemic.翻译:这个前荷兰殖民地迫切需要国际货币基金组织、巴黎俱乐部、印度和中国等债权人的债务减免，而且它正在努力偿还债务，因为其大宗商品出口受到全球价格暴跌的打击，而且其储备也因成本而枯竭。疫情期间进口主食大幅上涨。

"With China, we are aiming for a similar deal as we have received with India, for instance," Ramdin explained.翻译:拉姆丁解释说：“我们的目标是与中国达成类似的协议，例如与印度达成的协议。”

In June, Suriname agreed to repay the approximately $39 million it owes India within 15.5 or 20.5 years, depending on the type of loan, with a maximum annual fixed-interest rate of 1.20%.翻译:6月，苏里南同意在15.5或20.5年内偿还欠印度的约3900万美元，具体取决于贷款类型，最高年固定利率为1.20%。

Suriname needs to a secure a deal with China, the largest of its bilateral creditors, to help it improve its international credit rating so that it can attract fresh foreign funds for its oil and gas industries, Ramdin said, adding that he saw "good opportunities" for Chinese firms in these sectors once policymakers have shored up the economy.翻译:拉姆丁表示，苏里南需要与最大的双边债权人中国达成协议，以帮助其提高国际信用评级，从而为其石油和天然气行业吸引新的外国资金，并补充说，他看到了“良好的机会” “一旦政策制定者提振了经济，这些行业的中国企业就会受益。

"I hope in the coming days, we'll see that understanding translate into an acceptance: whether that will be a haircut on the interest rate or maturity... and I can go back with a proposal from their side," Ramdin said, adding that he was due to meet with EXIM officials on Thursday.翻译:拉姆丁说：“我希望在未来几天，我们会看到这种理解转化为接受：无论这是否会降低利率或期限……我可以带着他们的建议回去。”并补充说，他将于周四与进出口银行官员会面。

The bank did not immediately respond to Reuters' request for comment.翻译:该银行没有立即回应路透社的置评请求。

Ramdin said he expects EXIM officials to visit Suriname to complete the deal before the year's end.翻译:拉姆丁表示，他预计进出口官员将访问苏里南，以便在年底前完成该交易。

Suriname on Monday said it had reached a deal with its private creditors to exchange $675 million of dollar bonds for new notes, with owners of more than 92% of the bonds by value signing up.翻译:苏里南周一表示，已与其私人债权人达成协议，将价值 6.75 亿美元的美元债券换成新票据，按价值计算，超过 92% 的债券所有者已签署协议。

Reporting by Joe Cash; Additional reporting by Ank Kuipers in Paramaribo; Editing by Sharon Singleton翻译:乔·卡什报道； Ank Kuipers 在帕拉马里博的补充报道；莎朗·辛格尔顿编辑

item.title: Recco Control 出价 16.4 亿美元将 Hollysys 私有化，高于 Ascendent 出价
item.description:
Recco Control Technology Pte. Ltd. and Dazheng Group Investment Holdings Company Limited offered to pay $1.64 billion to acquire Hollysys Automation Technologies (HOLI.F), increasing its bid by 6% from what if offered to pay in August, the group told Reuters.翻译:瑞科控制技术私人有限公司该集团告诉路透社，大正集团投资控股有限公司和大正集团投资控股有限公司提出支付16.4亿美元收购和利时自动化技术公司（HOLI.F） ，其出价比8月份提出的支付价格提高了6%。

The group has proposed an all-cash offer of $26.50 a share for the automation control system maker, compared with the $25 a share offer it made in August.翻译:该集团已向这家自动化控制系统制造商提出每股 26.50 美元的全现金收购要约，而 8 月份提出的每股收购要约为 25 美元。

The current bid represents a 42% premium to the company's closing price before the group submitted its first bid.翻译:目前的出价较该集团提交首次出价前的收盘价溢价 42%。

The new offer is more than the $1.6 billion takeover bid Hollysys received on Monday from China-focused private equity firm Ascendant Capital Partners which offered to pay $26 per share in cash for the company.翻译:新的收购要约高于和利时周一从专注于中国的私募股权公司 Ascendant Capital Partners 收到的 16 亿美元收购要约，该公司提出以每股 26 美元的现金收购该公司。

The Recco group's decision to raise its offer is "underpinned by our steadfast pursuit of acquiring Hollysys and our motivation to be competitive in a transparent and genuine sale process," Recco director Ke Lei told Reuters.翻译:Recco 董事柯磊告诉路透社，Recco 集团提高报价的决定“基于我们对收购和利时的坚定追求，以及我们在透明和真实的销售过程中保持竞争力的动机”。

"We believe that this offer, which is at a compelling premium, represents an unparalleled opportunity for Hollysys' shareholders to maximize the value of their shares swiftly and with certainty," he said.翻译:他表示：“我们相信，这一溢价令人信服的要约对于和利时的股东来说是一个无与伦比的机会，可以迅速而确定地实现其股票价值的最大化。”

Hollysys' management team proposed a consideration of $25 per share last month and told Reuters on Tuesday the company "is open to serious and compelling offers from all parties."翻译:和利时的管理团队上个月提出每股 25 美元的收购价，并于周二告诉路透社，该公司“对各方提出的认真且令人信服的报价持开放态度”。

It started a formal sales process last month and is being advised by Deutsche Bank (DBKGn.DE).翻译:该公司上个月开始正式销售流程，并得到德意志银行(DBKGn.DE)的建议。

A year ago Hollysys management was ready to take the company private at a $1.8 billion valuation, Reuters reported, but nothing has happened since then.翻译:据路透社报道，一年前和利时管理层准备以 18 亿美元的估值将该公司私有化，但此后什么也没发生。

The 30-year old company, valued at $1.35 billion, operates in four sectors: industrial automation, transportation automation, medical and health care, and energy and environmental protection. Its stock has climbed 30% since January. The company is listed in the United States, incorporated in the British Virgin Islands and headquartered in China.翻译:这家拥有30年历史的公司估值13.5亿美元，业务涉及工业自动化、交通自动化、医疗保健、能源环保四个领域。自 1 月份以来，其股价已上涨 30%。该公司在美国上市，在英属维尔京群岛注册成立，总部位于中国。

Reporting by Svea Herbst-Bayliss Editing by Chris Reese翻译:Svea Herbst-Bayliss 报道 Chris Reese 编辑

item.title: 通用汽车和 Stellantis 投资电动汽车磁铁初创公司，以减少对中国的依赖
item.description:
General Motors (GM.N) and Stellantis (STLAM.MI) said on Wednesday they will invest in startup Niron Magnetics, part of a plan to develop electric-vehicle magnets without rare earths as the automotive industry aims to curb its reliance on China.翻译:通用汽车(GM.N)和 Stellantis (STLAM.MI)周三表示，他们将投资初创公司 Niron Magnetics，这是开发不含稀土的电动汽车磁铁计划的一部分，因为汽车行业旨在遏制对中国的依赖。

The automakers joined Niron's latest $33 million funding round and plan to collaborate to help develop permanent magnets built without rare earths, a step that would, if successful, reshape how the materials are used for the transition to EVs.翻译:两家汽车制造商加入了 Niron 最新一轮 3300 万美元的融资，并计划合作帮助开发不含稀土的永磁体，如果成功，这一举措将重塑这些材料在向电动汽车过渡中的使用方式。

"Permanent magnets are the unsung heroes and essential components of countless parts of your vehicle," Niron CEO Jonathan Rowntree told reporters on a call. "Where they have the greatest impact for GM is in the drivetrain to their future EVs. Today, roughly 90% of the rare-earth magnet supply is dependent upon China."翻译:Niron 首席执行官乔纳森·朗特里 (Jonathan Rowntree) 在电话中告诉记者：“永磁体是无名英雄，是车辆无数部件的重要组成部分。” “它们对通用汽车影响最大的是未来电动汽车的传动系统。如今，大约 90% 的稀土磁体供应依赖于中国。”

The move follows China's announcement in October that it would require export permits for some graphite products, which are also used in EVs, to protect national security.翻译:此前，中国于 10 月份宣布，为了保护国家安全，将要求某些石墨产品获得出口许可，这些产品也用于电动汽车。

Financial terms of the Niron round were not disclosed by the companies, but a person familiar with the deal, who asked not to be identified, said GM invested $7 million and Stellantis $5 million.翻译:两家公司没有透露 Niron 轮融资的财务条款，但一位不愿透露姓名的知情人士表示，通用汽车投资了 700 万美元，Stellantis 投资了 500 万美元。

"We believe Niron's unique technology can play a key role in reducing rare earth minerals from EV motors and help us further scale our North American-based supply chain for EVs," GM Ventures President Anirvan Coomer said.翻译:GM Ventures 总裁 Anirvan Coomer 表示：“我们相信 Niron 的独特技术可以在减少电动汽车发动机中的稀土矿物方面发挥关键作用，并帮助我们进一步扩大北​​美电动汽车供应链。”

Permanent magnets are essentially the motors of an EV, helping to transfer power into motion.翻译:永磁体本质上是电动汽车的电机，有助于将动力转化为运动。

EV motors consist of parts typically made from rare-earth minerals like terbium, dysprosium, praseodymium and neodymium, which are expensive and currently processed almost entirely overseas.翻译:电动汽车电机的零部件通常由铽、镝、镨和钕等稀土矿物制成，这些矿物价格昂贵，目前几乎全部在海外加工。

"Making powerful magnets from plentiful commodity materials decouples new production from rare earth mine development and lowers overall environmental impact," Stellantis Ventures managing partner Adam Bazih said.翻译:Stellantis Ventures 管理合伙人 Adam Bazih 表示：“利用丰富的商品材料制造强力磁铁，可以将新生产与稀土矿开发脱钩，并降低整体环境影响。”

Minneapolis-based Niron said it believes its iron nitride magnet - which it has branded as a Clean Earth Magnet - is more magnetic than a traditional permanent magnet made with neodymium and praseodymium.翻译:总部位于明尼阿波利斯的 Niron 表示，它相信其氮化铁磁铁（其品牌为“清洁地球磁铁”）比由钕和镨制成的传统永磁体更具磁性。

"There's a lot of manufacturing steps and a lack of price transparency in this industry with rare earths, given the concentration of supplies in China," Niron Senior Director Tom Grainger said.翻译:Niron 高级总监汤姆·格兰杰 (Tom Grainger) 表示：“鉴于供应集中在中国，稀土行业存在大量制造步骤，且价格缺乏透明度。”

The deal comes despite GM's 2021 agreement to buy rare-earth magnets from MP Materials (MP.N). MP has struggled to refine its own rare earths in California, but has been building a magnet facility in Texas.翻译:尽管通用汽车已同意 2021 年从 MP Materials (MP.N)购买稀土磁体，但该交易还是达成了。 MP一直在努力在加利福尼亚州精炼自己的稀土，但一直在德克萨斯州建造一座磁铁工厂。

Reporting by Nathan Gomes in Bengaluru and Ernest Scheyder in New York Editing by Ben Klayman and Matthew Lewis翻译:内森·戈麦斯在班加罗尔报道和欧内斯特·谢德在纽约报道本·克莱曼和马修·刘易斯编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国地产救市？平安保险集团和碧桂园是谁？
item.description:
Chinese authorities have asked Ping An Insurance Group to take a controlling stake in embattled Country Garden (2007.HK), the nation's biggest private property developer, Reuters reported on Wednesday, citing sources familiar with the plan.翻译:路透社周三援引知情人士的消息称，中国当局已要求平安保险集团控股陷入困境的中国最大的私营房地产开发商碧桂园（2007.HK） 。

A state-engineered rescue of Country Garden by Ping An would be one of the most significant interventions to date by China to support its cash-squeezed, highly indebted property sector, which accounts for one-quarter of economic activity. The sector's growing debt defaults have sparked fears of a broader financial crisis, battering investor confidence and spooking potential home buyers.

WHO IS PING AN?

Established in 1988, Ping An, which literally means "peace and safety", started off as a property and causality insurer and later expanded into life insurance, banking, investment and asset management.翻译:平安成立于1988年，字面意思是“平安与安全”，最初是一家财产和因果保险公司，后来扩展到人寿保险、银行、投资和资产管理领域。

Ping An, based in the southern tech hub of Shenzhen, vies with China Life (601628.SS) for the title of the country's biggest insurance group by market value. It had total assets of 11.47 trillion yuan ($1.58 trillion) and more than 229 million retail customers as of end-June, according to its latest interim report.翻译:总部位于南方科技中心深圳的平安与中国人寿（601628.SS）争夺中国市值最大的保险集团的称号。根据其最新的中期报告，截至 6 月底，该公司的总资产为 11.47 万亿元人民币（1.58 万亿美元），零售客户超过 2.29 亿。

It has in recent years been allocating 1% of its annual revenue to research and development, focusing on new technologies and building up expertise in the fintech and healthcare-related areas.翻译:近年来，该公司一直将年收入的 1% 用于研发，专注于新技术并在金融科技和医疗保健相关领域积累专业知识。

A number of its units including Lufax Holding (LU.N), OneConnect (6638.HK) and Ping An Healthcare and Technology (1833.HK) have gone public in New York and Hong Kong.翻译:旗下陆金所控股（LU.N） 、金融壹账通（6638.HK） 、平安医疗科技（1833.HK）等多家子公司已在纽约和香港上市。

The financial conglomerate is led by founder and chairman Ma Mingzhe, whose surname means "horse" in Mandarin.翻译:这家金融集团由创始人兼董事长马明哲领导，马明哲的姓氏在普通话中意为“马”。

Ping An is one of the first Chinese financial institutions that brought in foreign investors Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs in the 1990s.翻译:中国平安是20世纪90年代最早引进外国投资者摩根士丹利和高盛的中国金融机构之一。

In 2002, HSBC took a 10% stake in the company.翻译:2002年，汇丰银行持有该公司10%的股份。

Ping An first reported in late 2017 it owned a 5% stake in HSBC and later boosted its stake. As HSBC's biggest shareholder, Ping An has pushed the European lender to split off its Asian business to boost returns.翻译:中国平安于 2017 年底首次公布其持有汇丰银行 5% 的股份，随后又增持了股份。作为汇丰银行的最大股东，中国平安已推动这家欧洲银行剥离其亚洲业务，以提高回报。

Ping An went public in Hong Kong in 2004, followed by a listing in Shanghai three years later.翻译:中国平安于2004年在香港上市，三年后在上海上市。

It counts state firms including Shenzhen Investment Holdings Co and Central Huijin Investment and a unit of Thai conglomerate Charoen Pokphand Group (CP Group) among its top shareholders.

WHO IS COUNTRY GARDEN?

Until this year, Country Garden was the largest Chinese developer by sales. The company was previously considered financially sound compared with peers such as China Evergrande Group (3333.HK), which defaulted on its debt in late 2021.翻译:截至今年，碧桂园仍是中国销售额最大的开发商。与中国恒大集团（3333.HK）等同行相比，该公司此前被认为财务状况良好，后者于2021年底出现债务违约。

Country Garden had total liabilities of 1.4 trillion yuan ($191.46 billion) at the end of June, including nearly $11 billion of offshore bonds and $6 billion of offshore loans.翻译:截至6月底，碧桂园的总负债为1.4万亿元人民币（1,914.6亿美元），其中包括近110亿美元的离岸债券和60亿美元的离岸贷款。

While Country Garden's liabilities are only 59% as large as those of Evergrande, the world's most indebted developer, it has more than 3,000 projects under development nationwide, compared to around 800 for Evergrande.翻译:虽然碧桂园的负债仅相当于全球负债最重的开发商恒大的59%，但其全国在建项目超过3000个，而恒大约有800个。

Regulators and homebuyers are closely watching whether Country Garden's liquidity stress will make it unable to complete homes, which could stir social unrest.翻译:监管机构和购房者正在密切关注碧桂园的流动性压力是否会导致其无法竣工，从而引发社会动荡。

Country Garden has said repeatedly that "home delivery" is its top priority.

WHY HAS BEIJING PICKED PING AN TO RESCUE COUNTRY GARDEN?

Reuters reported that Chinese authorities are keen that any risks posed by Country Garden's liquidity problems should not spill over into the wider economy.翻译:路透社报道称，中国当局希望碧桂园流动性问题带来的任何风险不应蔓延到更广泛的经济领域。

Authorities would prefer the developer's liquidity problems be resolved within Guangdong province, as per the report. Ping An was a natural choice because it is based in Guangdong and has been a major Country Garden shareholder, said the sources.翻译:报告称，当局希望开发商的流动性问题在广东省内得到解决。消息人士称，平安是一个自然选择，因为它总部位于广东，并且一直是碧桂园的主要股东。

Ping An said after the Reuters report that it no longer holds Country Garden shares. It held a 4.99% stake as of Aug. 11, according to Hong Kong stock exchange data.翻译:中国平安在路透社报道后表示，不再持有碧桂园股份。根据香港证券交易所数据，截至8月11日，该公司持有4.99%的股份。

Country Garden's largest shareholder, with a stake of about 52%, is Yang Huiyan, chairperson and daughter of a co-founder.

HOW BIG IS PING AN'S EXPOSURE TO REAL ESTATE?

Ping An's property investments through its insurance funds stood at 209.4 billion yuan ($28.64 billion), or 4.5% of its total insurance investment assets as of end June, according to the interim report.翻译:中期报告显示，截至 6 月底，平安通过保险资金进行的房地产投资为 2094 亿元人民币（286.4 亿美元），占其保险投资总资产的 4.5%。

The insurer was looking for more real estate-related investment opportunities and was considering investing hundreds of billions of yuan of insurance funds in long-term rental apartments and public housing, then company President Alex Ren said 2019.翻译:时任公司总裁任正非2019年表示，该公司正在寻找更多与房地产相关的投资机会，并考虑将数千亿元的保险资金投资于长租公寓和公共住房。

Reuters reported in 2021 that Chinese regulator probed Ping An's investments in the property market and ordered the insurer to stop selling alternative investment products, which are typically tied to the property market.翻译:路透社 2021 年报道称，中国监管机构调查了平安在房地产市场的投资，并命令该保险公司停止销售通常与房地产市场相关的另类投资产品。

($1 = 7.2790 Chinese yuan)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2790 人民币）

Reporting by Julie Zhu; Editing by Kim Coghill翻译:朱莉报道；编辑：金·科吉尔

item.title: 印度加快某些领域中国专业人士的签证速度--消息人士
item.description:
India has framed new rules to expedite clearing of visas for Chinese nationals working in the sectors where the government has offered incentives to boost local manufacturing, a government source said on Wednesday.翻译:一位政府消息人士周三表示，印度已制定新规则，以加快在政府提供激励措施以促进当地制造业发展的行业工作的中国公民的签证办理速度。

Relations between the two nations have plummeted after soldiers from both sides clashed in the Himalayas in 2020 and investments have been put under additional scrutiny.翻译:2020 年双方士兵在喜马拉雅山发生冲突后，两国关系急剧恶化，投资也受到更多审查。

During a review of India's main industry incentive scheme also known as production linked scheme (PLI) company executives asked the government to expedite visa for Chinese professionals as it was slowing investments.翻译:在审查印度主要行业激励计划（也称为生产挂钩计划（PLI））时，公司高管要求政府加快对中国专业人士的签证审批，因为政府正在放缓投资。

"A new SOP (standard operating procedure) has been circulated for those working in the PLI sector. This will help streamline visa approvals and yes this is for Chinese nationals," one government official, who declined to be named, told reporters in New Delhi.翻译:一位不愿透露姓名的政府官员在新德里对记者表示：“新的 SOP（标准操作程序）已经向 PLI 行业的工作人员分发。这将有助于简化签证审批，是的，这是针对中国公民的。” 。

India is trying to attract investments to its nearly $24 billion PLI, launched in 2020 that covers 14 sectors ranging from electronic products to drones.翻译:印度正试图为其 2020 年推出的近 240 亿美元的 PLI 吸引投资，涵盖从电子产品到无人机等 14 个行业。

The details of the new rules were not immediately available. The ministry of external and home affairs did not immediately respond to an emailed request for comment.翻译:新规则的细节尚未立即公布。外交和内政部没有立即回复通过电子邮件发送的置评请求。

Reporting by Shivangi Acharya, writing by Aftab Ahmed and Tanvi Mehta Editing by Tomasz Janowski翻译:Shivangi Acharya 报道，Aftab Ahmed 和 Tanvi Mehta 撰稿，Tomasz Janowski 编辑

item.title: 平安市值缩水21亿美元，碧桂园救助报告带动中国房地产上涨
item.description:
Summary:
  • Reuters reports Ping An asked to buy stake in Country Garden
  • Ping An shares fall 5%; Country Garden shares rise 12%
  • Real estate stocks and bonds rally
翻译:概括：
  • 路透社报道中国平安要求收购碧桂园股份
  • 平安股价下跌5%；碧桂园股价上涨12%
  • 房地产股和债券上涨

China property stocks rallied and Ping An Insurance Group shares slumped to a one-year low on Wednesday after Reuters reported Chinese authorities had asked the firm to take a controlling stake in troubled developer Country Garden.翻译:在路透社报道中国当局要求平安保险控股陷入困境的开发商碧桂园后，中国房地产股周三上涨，平安保险集团股价跌至一年低点。

Ping An's Hong Kong-listed shares tumbled 5.4%, their sharpest daily fall in more than a year, wiping out almost $2.1 billion in market capitalisation. Turnover was the highest in almost a year.翻译:平安在香港上市的股价暴跌 5.4%，创一年多来最大单日跌幅，市值蒸发近 21 亿美元。成交额创近一年来最高。

Country Garden <2007.HK> shares rose to a one-month high and closed up more than 12%. Its dollar debts also rallied.翻译:碧桂园<2007.HK>股价升至一个月高位，收涨逾12%。其美元债务也有所上涨。

A spokesperson for Ping An (601318.SS) said the company had not been approached by the government and denied the information reported by Reuters, which cited four sources familiar with the plan.翻译:中国平安（601318.SS）发言人表示，政府尚未与该公司接洽，并否认了路透社报道的信息，路透社援引了四名熟悉该计划的消息人士的话说。

However, markets took it as a positive signal for the debt-laden property sector, which has been weighing heavily on the world's second-largest economy and stirring fears of broader financial system contagion.翻译:然而，市场将其视为负债累累的房地产行业的积极信号，该行业一直给世界第二大经济体带来沉重压力，并引发了人们对更广泛的金融体系蔓延的担忧。

Developers China Evergrande (3333.HK) and Sunac China Holdings (1918.HK) jumped roughly 30% each. An index of Hong Kong-listed mainland developers (.HSMPI) rose 2.7%.翻译:开发商中国恒大（3333.HK）和融创中国控股（1918.HK）各上涨约30%。在香港上市的内地开发商指数(.HSMPI)上涨 2.7%。

"Such a move should mitigate or control the risks in the market," said Lu Wenxi, analyst at property agency Centaline.翻译:中原地产分析师陆文曦表示：“此举应该会减轻或控制市场风险。”

"This move is a big boost to market confidence, because now the whole real estate market, especially some major real estate enterprises are under pretty big pressure, and their bankruptcy risks triggering a chain reaction."翻译:“此举对市场信心是一个很大的提振，因为现在整个房地产市场，特别是一些大型房企面临着很大的压力，其破产风险引发了连锁反应。”

In debt markets, some of Country Garden's shorter term bonds, such as a dollar bond maturing early in 2024 , were as much as 2 cents firmer at around 6 cents on the dollar.翻译:在债务市场上，碧桂园的一些短期债券（例如 2024 年初到期的美元债券）上涨了 2 美分，兑美元汇率约为 6 美分。

Elsewhere, a Wanda Properties dollar bond maturing early in 2024 was up more than half a cent at 50.75 to the dollar.翻译:其他方面，2024 年初到期的万达地产美元债券上涨超过半美分，至 1 美元兑换 50.75 美元。

Reporting by Anne Marie Roantree in Hong Kong. Additional reporting by Tom Westbrook in Singapore; Editing by Edmund Klamann and Kim Coghill翻译:安妮·玛丽·罗恩特里 (Anne Marie Roantree) 香港报道。汤姆·威斯布鲁克在新加坡的补充报道；编辑：埃德蒙·克拉曼和金·科希尔

item.title: 对路透社关于平安可能拯救碧桂园的报道的反应
item.description:
Chinese authorities have asked Ping An Insurance Group to take a controlling stake in embattled Country Garden (2007.HK), the nation's biggest private property developer, four people familiar with the plan told Reuters.翻译:四位知情人士告诉路透社，中国当局已要求平安保险集团控股陷入困境的中国最大的私营房地产开发商碧桂园（2007.HK） 。

Ping An has said it categorically denies the story.翻译:中国平安表示断然否认这一报道。

Following are reactions to the article.翻译:以下是对该文章的反应。

LU WENXI, ANALYST AT PROPERTY AGENCY CENTALINE:翻译:中原地产分析师卢文曦：

"China’s government departments and state-owned enterprises intervening in large private real estate firms would ensure a good disposal mechanism of bad assets. This is quite important. The key is that this gives positive expectations to the market that debt risks are controllable."翻译:“中国政府部门和国有企业介入大型民营房地产企业，可以保证不良资产有一个良好的处置机制。这一点非常重要，关键是这给市场带来了债务风险可控的积极预期。”

MA HONG, SENIOR ANALYST AT ZHIXIN INVESTMENT RESEARCH:翻译:马红，致信投资研究部高级分析师：

"Rescuing one developer does not solve risks for the whole real estate industry.翻译:“拯救一个开发商并不能解决整个房地产行业的风险。

"I hope authorities plan more systematic debt relief for the entire sector, instead of relying on one group or one local government to carry out a bailout.翻译:“我希望当局为整个行业制定更系统的债务减免计划，而不是依赖某一团体或某一地方政府来实施救助。

"These are very large companies. It's not easy for state-owned firms to acquire them, especially now that local governments are also under financial pressure."翻译:“这些都是非常大的公司。国有企业收购它们并不容易，尤其是现在地方政府也面临着财政压力。”

EUGENE LAW, DIRECTOR OF CHINA GALAXY INTERNATIONAL:翻译:中国银河国际董事尤金·罗：

"If the central government steps in to help Country Garden, it's for easing the debt crisis and preventing a spillover to financial institutions. But it will not help the China property market, which depends on factors, including employment and consumer confidence. Homebuyers would not rush to buy property just because Country Garden gets out of trouble.翻译:“如果中央政府出手帮助碧桂园，是为了缓解债务危机，防止对金融机构的溢出效应。但这对中国房地产市场没有帮助，中国房地产市场取决于就业和消费者信心等因素。购房者不会只因碧桂园摆脱困境而抢购房产。

MICHAEL WONG, DIRECTOR OF PC SECURITIES:翻译:PC 证券总监 MICHAEL WONG：

"The news will give a short-lived boost to Country Garden's stock price and market sentiment, but it ultimately depends on whether Country Garden will be rescued and able to deliver homes at the end of the day. For the broader property market, the key is still home sales."翻译:“这个消息对碧桂园的股价和市场情绪会产生短暂的提振，但最终还是要看碧桂园能否获救并能够在最后交付房屋。对于更大的房地产市场来说，关键是仍然是房屋销售。”

XU TIANCHEN, SENIOR ECONOMIST, ECONOMIST INTELLIGENCE UNIT:翻译:经济学人情报部高级经济师徐天辰：

"If this is true, it will have a very significant positive impact on the property and capital markets. If the crisis is allowed to spread and confidence collapses, the risk is that China enters a negative feedback loop of debt and deflation and succumbs into a lost decade in terms of growth.翻译:“如果这是真的，将对房地产和资本市场产生非常重大的积极影响。如果任由危机蔓延、信心崩溃，中国面临的风险是进入债务和通货紧缩的负反馈循环，陷入债务和通货紧缩的恶性循环。”就增长而言，失去了十年。

"Policies already in place, such as demand-side easing and encouraging banks to increase lending to developers, are not enough to solve the current problem. Only equity injections, such as corporate takeovers or nationalisations, are likely to turn around the confidence of home buyers and investors and materially change the situation."翻译:“已经出台的政策，例如需求方宽松和鼓励银行增加对开发商的贷款，不足以解决当前的问题。只有企业收购或国有化等股权注入，才有可能扭转国内信心。”买家和投资者，并实质性地改变这种情况。”

YAO YU, FOUNDER OF CREDIT ANALYSIS FIRM RATINGDOG:翻译:姚宇，信用分析公司评级狗创始人：

"Such a move could play a big role in restoring market sentiment. From what we saw being conveyed at the Central Financial Work Conference, finance needs to serve the real economy and letting Ping An take action would reflect the will of regulators.翻译:“这样的举措对于恢复市场情绪会起到很大的作用。从中央金融工作会议传达的信息来看，金融要服务实体经济，让平安出手，体现了监管层的意愿。”

Country Garden's delivery of homes would be smoother, and homebuyers' worries about unfinished homes could be reduced to a certain extent, which would in turn be conducive to the restoration of home-buying confidence for the entire market.翻译:碧桂园的交房将会更加顺利，一定程度上可以减少购房者对烂尾房的担忧，有利于整个市场购房信心的恢复。

Restoring home-buying confidence would, in general, benefit other private property developers."

GARY NG, SENIOR ECONOMIST, NATIXIS, HONG KONG

"It is probably not so much about debt repayment but the policy goal to complete existing projects. Country Garden may have reached a tipping point where it will need more liquidity to fulfill such a policy goal. The Chinese government is clearly exploring options, and it is a moment of mobilising state resources to limit contagion risks."翻译:“这可能与其说是偿还债务，不如说是完成现有项目的政策目标。碧桂园可能已经达到了一个转折点，需要更多的流动性来实现这样的政策目标。中国政府显然正在探索选择，并且现在是动员国家资源限制传染风险的时刻。”

Reporting by Reuters staff, Clare Jim in HONG KONG, compiled by Anne Marie Roantree; Editing by Edwina Gibbs and Kim Coghill翻译:路透社工作人员 Clare Jim 在香港的报道，Anne Marie Roantree 编译；编辑：埃德温娜·吉布斯和金·科吉尔

item.title: 制造商着眼于销售目标，11月份中国汽车销量增长20%
item.description:
China's car sales are expected to jump by more than 20% in November, the China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) said on Wednesday, citing increased confidence among carmakers striving to deliver annual sales goals in the world's top auto market.翻译:中国乘用车协会(CPCA)周三表示，中国11月份汽车销量预计将增长20%以上，理由是汽车制造商努力在全球顶级汽车市场实现年度销售目标的信心增强。

Car sales totalled 2.05 million units in October, up 9.9% from a year earlier, extending gains to a third month. Sales in the first 10 months of 2023 rose 3% year-on-year to 17.46 million units.翻译:10月份汽车销量总计205万辆，同比增长9.9%，连续第三个月保持增长。 2023年前10个月销量同比增长3%至1746万辆。

The October figures came on the back of a 2.2% increase in August and a 4.7% rise in September.翻译:10 月份的数据是在 8 月份增长 2.2% 和 9 月份增长 4.7% 的基础上公布的。

New energy vehicle (NEV) sales rose by 37.5% in October year-on-year, accounting for 37.4% of total car sales. NEV sales growth picked up from a 22.1% increase in September, amid signs that an economic recovery was gaining traction.翻译:10月份新能源汽车销量同比增长37.5%，占汽车销售总量的37.4%。有迹象表明经济复苏势头增强，新能源汽车销量增速较 9 月份 22.1% 有所回升。

Demand for electric vehicles, however, has weakened in China as consumers favour more economical plug-in hybrids, helping carmakers such as Li Auto (2015.HK) and BYD (002594.SZ) gain market share.翻译:然而，随着消费者青睐更经济的插电式混合动力汽车，中国对电动汽车的需求有所减弱，这帮助理想汽车（2015.HK）和比亚迪（002594.SZ）等汽车制造商赢得了市场份额。

BYD sold 301,095 passenger cars, including its Dynasty and Ocean series and Denza brand in October, up 38.4% year-on-year, with more than 10% exported, according to the company.翻译:据比亚迪介绍，10月份比亚迪乘用车销量达301,095辆，包括王朝系列、海洋系列和腾势品牌，同比增长38.4%，其中出口量超过10%。

It offered limited-time discounts for November on some of its best-selling models as the company strives to meet its annual sales target of 3 million units. BYD had sold year-to-date 2.38 million new energy vehicles of both pure electric and plug-in hybrids.翻译:为实现全年300万台的销售目标，该公司对部分畅销车型进行了11月限时折扣。截至目前，比亚迪新能源汽车销量达238万辆，包括纯电动和插电式混合动力汽车。

U.S. EV giant Tesla (TSLA.O), in comparison with its Chinese rivals, saw lower sales, with October deliveries of China-made EVs down 2.6% from a month earlier and just 0.6% higher year-on- year.翻译:与中国竞争对手相比，美国电动汽车巨头特斯拉(TSLA.O)的销量较低，10 月份中国制造的电动汽车交付量环比下降 2.6%，同比仅增长 0.6%。

Tesla exported 43,489 China-made EVs last month, up 42.3% from 30,566 in September, CPCA data showed, when the passenger vehicle export growth cooled slightly to 49% from 50% in September.翻译:CPCA数据显示，特斯拉上个月出口了43,489辆中国制造的电动汽车，比9月份的30,566辆增长42.3%，而乘用车出口增速从9月份的50%小幅降至49%。

A price war started by Tesla at the beginning of the year is dragging down profitability of companies that only make EVs, and these firms have stepped up efforts to prune costs and build partnerships to survive.翻译:特斯拉年初发起的价格战正在拖累纯电动汽车公司的盈利能力，这些公司已加大力度削减成本并建立合作伙伴关系以求生存。

"The auto sector has already been in a very miserable state, with profit margins at absolutely historical lows of merely 4.5% in September," CPCA Secretary General Cui Dongshu said, referring only to figures for September.翻译:乘联会秘书长崔东树表示，“汽车行业已经处于非常惨淡的境地，9月份的利润率仅为4.5%，处于绝对历史低位。”他仅指的是9月份的数据。

Leapmotor (9863.HK) just struck a deal with European legacy conglomerate Stellantis (STLAM.MI) to gain a European foothold.翻译:零跑汽车（9863.HK）刚刚与欧洲传统企业集团Stellantis （STLAM.MI）达成协议，以在欧洲站稳脚跟。

Nio (9866.HK) plans to trim its workforce by 10% this month as it tries to improve efficiency and reduce costs in the face of growing competition, the Chinese EV upstart said on Friday.翻译:中国电动汽车新贵蔚来汽车(9866.HK)周五表示，该公司计划本月裁员10%，以应对日益激烈的竞争，提高效率并降低成本。

Reporting by Qiaoyi Li, Zhang Yan and Brenda Goh Editing by Sam Holmes, David Goodman and Miral Fahmy翻译:李巧仪、张岩和 Brenda Goh 报道 Sam Holmes、David Goodman 和 Miral Fahmy 编辑

item.title: 俄罗斯绍伊古十天内第二次会见中国军方高级官员
item.description:
Summary:
  • This content was produced in Russia, where the law restricts coverage of Russian military operations in Ukraine.
翻译:概括：
  • 此内容是在俄罗斯制作的，该国法律限制报道俄罗斯在乌克兰的军事行动。

Russian Defence Minister Sergei Shoigu held talks in Moscow on Wednesday with a senior Chinese military official and said they would discuss steps to deepen cooperation, Interfax news agency reported.翻译:据国际文传电讯社报道，俄罗斯国防部长谢尔盖·绍伊古周三在莫斯科与中国高级军事官员举行会谈，并表示他们将讨论深化合作的步骤。

"We, unlike some aggressive Western countries, are not creating a military bloc. Relations between Russia and China are an example of strategic interaction based on trust and respect,” it quoted Shoigu as saying at the meeting with General Zhang Youxia, vice chairman of China's Central Military Commission.翻译:绍伊古在会见俄罗斯联邦副主席张又侠将军时表示：“与一些咄咄逼人的西方国家不同，我们并没有建立军事集团。俄罗斯和中国之间的关系是基于信任和尊重的战略互动的典范。”中国中央军事委员会。

It was the second time the two men had met in the space of 10 days, following talks on the sidelines of a forum that Shoigu attended in Beijing on Oct. 30.翻译:这是两人在 10 天内第二次会面，此前绍伊古于 10 月 30 日在北京出席一个论坛期间进行了会谈。

Presidents Vladimir Putin and Xi Jinping proclaimed a "no limits" partnership less than three weeks before Russia sent its troops into Ukraine last year, and China has refrained from criticising Moscow's actions there. The United States has warned Beijing against supplying Russia with weapons.翻译:去年俄罗斯出兵乌克兰前不到三周，俄罗斯总统普京和习近平宣布建立“无限制”伙伴关系，而中国也没有批评莫斯科在乌克兰的行动。美国警告北京不要向俄罗斯提供武器。

item.title: 全球资产管理公司将中国视为长期赌注
item.description:
Top executives at global asset managers on Wednesday talked up China at an event in Hong Kong on Wednesday, championing long-term investment opportunities in an economy battling to break free of pandemic disruption.翻译:全球资产管理公司的高管周三在香港举行的一次活动上谈到了中国，在努力摆脱疫情破坏的经济中倡导长期投资机会。

While many multinational firms are working to spread risk away from China amid ongoing tension with the West, the country's importance to the global marketplace is undeniable, they said at the Global Financial Leaders Investment Summit.翻译:他们在全球金融领袖投资峰会上表示，尽管在与西方持续紧张的情况下，许多跨国公司正在努力分散中国的风险，但中国对全球市场的重要性是不可否认的。

The head of BlackRock's (BLK.N) global client business, Mark Wiedman, told the summit that future investment in China is likely to be more driven by capital markets as individuals diversify savings away from property and term deposits.翻译:贝莱德(BLK.N)全球客户业务负责人马克·维德曼(Mark Wiedman)在峰会上表示，随着个人将储蓄从房地产和定期存款转向多元化，未来对中国的投资可能更多地受到资本市场的推动。

"Those are big opportunities for us," Wiedman said. "Long term, (China) has to be part of a global investment portfolio."翻译:“这对我们来说是巨大的机会，”维德曼说。 “从长远来看，（中国）必须成为全球投资组合的一部分。”

Dozens of international executives took part in the event which began on Tuesday against a backdrop of economic slowdown in China where a massive debt crisis in the property sector has crippled some of its biggest firms and scared off investors.翻译:数十名国际高管参加了周二开始的这次活动，当时中国经济放缓，房地产行业的大规模债务危机导致一些最大的公司陷入瘫痪，并吓跑了投资者。

Reflecting continued tension with the West, China recorded its first-ever quarterly deficit in foreign direct investment, while the European Chamber of Commerce criticised a recent trade fair as more "political showcase" than business event.翻译:中国在外国直接投资方面首次出现季度逆差，反映出与西方的持续紧张关系，而欧盟商会则批评最近的贸易博览会更多的是“政治展示”而不是商业活动。

Still, the economy grew faster than analysts expected in the third quarter, improving the chance of the government meeting its growth target of around 5% for 2023 after the authorities introduced a string of support measures.翻译:尽管如此，第三季度经济增长速度仍快于分析师预期，在当局推出一系列支持措施后，提高了政府实现 2023 年 5% 左右增长目标的机会。

"If you lean into where the policies (are) going, you'll have a better opportunity to benefit from investing in those areas," Capital Group CEO Mike Gitlin said at the summit.翻译:资本集团首席执行官迈克·吉特林在峰会上表示：“如果你了解政策的走向，你将有更好的机会从这些领域的投资中受益。”

Similar comments highlighting investment opportunities came from other executives including HillHouse founder and chairman Lei Zhang, Fidelity International CEO Anne Richards and Invesco (IVZ.N) President and CEO Andrew Schlossberg.翻译:其他高管也强调了投资机会，包括高瓴创始人兼董事长张雷、富达国际首席执行官 Anne Richards 和 Invesco (IVZ.N)总裁兼首席执行官 Andrew Schlossberg。

Citadel Securities CEO Peng Zhao called China a driver of growth and innovation and said it was "baffling" to think otherwise.翻译:Citadel 证券首席执行官赵鹏称中国是增长和创新的驱动力，并表示如果有其他想法，那就“令人费解”。

He also said Citadel doubled its Hong Kong headcount in the face of pandemic-induced challenges, leveraging the talent the city hosts and its connectivity to other markets.翻译:他还表示，面对大流行带来的挑战，Citadel 将其香港员工人数增加了一倍，充分利用了香港拥有的人才及其与其他市场的连通性。

Trustar Capital CEO Zhang Yichen said multinational firms want to reduce China exposure but not exit.翻译:信星资本首席执行官张轶晨表示，跨国公司希望减少在中国的投资，但不想退出。

At a Singapore forum on Wednesday, HSBC Group (HSBA.L) CEO Noel Quinn said his bank had seen a 70% lift in business from Chinese clients looking to diversify outside of mainland China.翻译:在周三的新加坡论坛上，汇丰集团(HSBA.L)首席执行官诺埃尔·奎因 (Noel Quinn) 表示，汇丰银行的业务增长了 70%，这些客户来自希望在中国大陆以外实现多元化发展的中国客户。

Quinn told the Hong Kong event on Tuesday that wealth flow from mainland China to Hong Kong has grown 3 to 4 times this year.翻译:奎因周二在香港的活动中表示，今年从中国大陆流向香港的财富增长了3至4倍。

Reporting by Kane Wu, Xie Yu and Summer Zhen; Editing by Sumeet Chatterjee and Christopher Cushing翻译:吴凯恩、谢宇、夏震报道；编辑：Sumeet Chatterjee 和 Christopher Cushing

item.title: 增长测试不及格后，私立学校重新思考中国的未来
item.description:
Some shareholders of Dulwich College International are in talks for a sale of the British school's China-heavy Asia operations, two sources said, in the latest indication of how turmoil in China's $570 billion education industry is forcing overhauls at institutions.翻译:两名消息人士称，德威国际教育集团的一些股东正在就出售这所英国学校在中国市场占主导地位的亚洲业务进行谈判，这是中国价值 5700 亿美元的教育行业的动荡如何迫使各机构进行彻底改革的最新迹象。

Dozens of international and private schools in China are closing or merging, industry executives said, weighed down by tighter regulation, a slowing economy and dwindling foreign student numbers.翻译:行业高管表示，由于监管收紧、经济放缓和外国学生人数减少，中国数十所国际和私立学校正在关闭或合并。

A rapid expansion prior to the COVID-19 pandemic drove a surge of privately run bilingual schools in China offering a western exam curriculum. But the business stumbled as Beijing imposed new rules in 2021 and cracked down on the private tutoring business, aimed at easing pressure on children and lowering family costs.翻译:COVID-19 大流行之前的快速扩张推动了中国私立双语学校的激增，提供西方考试课程。但随着北京于 2021 年实施新规定并打击私人补习业务，旨在缓解儿童压力并降低家庭成本，该业务陷入困境。

Three years of the pandemic and slowing economic growth have exacerbated the challenges, said Julian Fisher, managing director of Venture Education, a Beijing-based market intelligence consultancy specialising in China's education sector.翻译:总部位于北京、专门从事中国教育行业的市场情报咨询公司风险教育公司董事总经理朱利安·费舍尔表示，三年来的疫情和经济增长放缓加剧了挑战。

"The cynic would say the sector is in terminal decline, the average Chinese investor simply that it's going through growing pains," said Fisher.翻译:费舍尔表示：“愤世嫉俗的人会说该行业正处于衰退期，而普通的中国投资者则简单地认为该行业正在经历成长的阵痛。”

Dulwich College International operates nine schools in China including bilingual schools catering to Chinese nationals that have been hit hardest by regulatory changes. Besides China, Dulwich International also has schools in Singapore and South Korea.翻译:德威国际教育集团在中国经营着九所学校，其中包括为受监管变化打击最严重的中国公民提供服务的双语学校。除中国外，德威国际还在新加坡和韩国设有学校。

Strategic plans for growth of its high schools in China were "scaled back in light of changing government regulations", Dulwich said in its 2022 annual report.翻译:德威在 2022 年年度报告中表示，“鉴于政府法规的变化，其在中国的高中发展战略计划有所缩减”。

In a response to Reuters' queries about a potential sale of its Asia business, Education in Motion (EiM), which owns and operates Dulwich College International schools and high schools in China, South Korea, and Singapore, said it was "in the process of bringing in a new strategic financial partner", adding the process would also allow partners to exit their investments in the group.翻译:在回应路透社关于可能出售其亚洲业务的询问时，Education in Motion (EiM) 在中国、韩国和新加坡拥有并经营德威国际教育集团的学校和高中，该公司表示“正在处理中”。引入新的战略金融合作伙伴”，并补充说，这一过程还允许合作伙伴退出对集团的投资。

It said it was a planned process of refinancing and "not connected to regulatory changes in any market".

SELF-SUFFICIENCY

China's schools, which are categorised into public, private and those for foreign passport holders, are crucial to leader Xi Jinping's strategy to use education to improve the country's self-sufficiency in science and technology and advance the "great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation on all fronts."翻译:中国的学校分为公办学校、民办学校和外国护照持有者学校，对于习近平主席利用教育提高国家科技自给自足、推进“中华民族伟大复兴”的战略至关重要。前线。”

In 2020 there were around 180,000 private education institutions nationwide, accounting for more than a third of all education institutions in China, with 55.6 million enrolled students, according to the British Council.翻译:英国文化协会的数据显示，2020年，全国约有18万所民办教育机构，占中国所有教育机构的三分之一以上，在校学生达5560万人。

However, international schools, which can only enrol students with foreign passports, have mostly seen student numbers decline due to expatriates from countries including the U.S., Britain and Canada leaving after the pandemic and amid rising geopolitical tensions.翻译:然而，由于美国、英国和加拿大等国家的外籍人士在疫情后离开以及地缘政治紧张局势加剧，只能招收持有外国护照的学生的国际学校的学生人数大多下降。

Beijing's crackdown amplified the pressure.翻译:北京的镇压加大了压力。

It mandated that Chinese compulsory education be taught in private schools, aligning the curriculum more closely to public schools and making parents question the need to pay private school fees when their children can attend free government schools.翻译:它规定中国的义务教育必须在私立学校教授，使课程更加接近公立学校，并让家长质疑当他们的孩子可以就读免费的公立学校时是否需要支付私立学校的费用。

Annual international school tuition fees in Shanghai, for instance, can exceed 300,000 yuan ($41,195).翻译:例如，上海国际学校每年的学费可能超过 30 万元人民币（41,195 美元）。

Authorities have also moved to control the number of private schools.翻译:当局还采取措施控制私立学校的数量。

And just last month, China's legislature passed a law to strengthen patriotic education in schools that will take effect on Jan. 1, 2024.翻译:就在上个月，中国立法机关通过了一项加强学校爱国主义教育的法律，该法将于 2024 年 1 月 1 日生效。

"For private primary and high schools, there is tighter regulation. It's also very difficult for some schools to get their licenses due to tighter control," said Frank Feng, deputy principal at Lucton, an international high school in Shanghai.翻译:上海莱克顿国际高中副校长弗兰克·冯说：“对于民办中小学来说，监管更严格。由于控制更严格，一些学校获得牌照也非常困难。”

Dozens of schools, from kindergartens to high schools, have shut or stalled in the past two years.翻译:过去两年，从幼儿园到高中的数十所学校关闭或停课。

In China's southern Greater Bay Area, shuttered schools include Dulwich International's Early Years Centre in Shenzhen, Eton-House international kindergarten and Victoria Kid House in Guangzhou. The companies did not immediately respond to requests for comment.翻译:在中国南部大湾区，关闭的学校包括深圳德威国际幼儿中心、伊顿国际幼儿园和广州维多利亚儿童之家。两家公司没有立即回应置评请求。

At Western International School of Shanghai, 20 staff were laid off in August due to an unexpected number of children not returning for the new school year, a direct source said. It did not immediately respond to requests for comment.翻译:直接消息人士称，由于新学年未返校的学生数量超出预期，上海西部国际学校 8 月份解雇了 20 名教职员工。它没有立即回应置评请求。

Many private education companies, including bilingual and international school operators, have been considering selling their China-based assets, said Jimmy Chin, director at Chinese buyout fund Everpine Capital, which has invested in the education business.翻译:投资教育业务的中国收购基金恒松资本董事吉米·钦(Jimmy Chin)表示，许多私立教育公司，包括双语和国际学校运营商，一直在考虑出售其在中国的资产。

“There are likely more sellers than buyers of education assets in China right now."

GEOPOLITICS

Universities are also increasingly relaxing requirements on English language, thereby reducing the need for foreign talent to push Xi's agenda of developing China into a science and technology powerhouse.翻译:大学也越来越放宽对英语语言的要求，从而减少了对外国人才的需求，以推动习近平将中国发展成为科技强国的议程。

A notice from Xi'an Jiaotong University in September said that starting from that month it would not use English proficiency test results for graduation requirements. The University of Science and Technology of China in Anhui announced it was cancelling six undergraduate majors, including English, from October.翻译:西安交通大学9月发布的通知称，自当月起，西安交通大学将不再使用英语水平测试成绩作为毕业要求。安徽中国科学技术大学宣布，从10月起取消英语等6个本科专业。

Geopolitical tensions have also added to concerns of an English language vacuum, making China more inward-looking.翻译:地缘政治紧张局势也加剧了人们对英语真空的担忧，使中国更加内向。

Nicholas Burns, the U.S. ambassador to China, told an Oct. 11 town hall that the number of American students in China had dropped to as low as 350 from 15,000 in 2015, although that had started to tick up again this year.翻译:美国驻华大使尼古拉斯·伯恩斯 (Nicholas Burns) 10 月 11 日在市政厅表示，美国在华学生人数已从 2015 年的 15,000 人降至 350 人，不过今年这一数字又开始回升。

A growing positive trend, however, has been the rise of students from Belt and Road countries, said Mathias Boyer, chief financial officer at the International School of Beijing, which is upgrading its facilities to include amenities like a multi-faith prayer room.翻译:北京国际学校首席财务官马蒂亚斯·博耶(Mathias Boyer)表示，一个日益增长的积极趋势是来自“一带一路”国家学生的崛起。该学校正在升级设施，增加多信仰祈祷室等设施。

"We have to completely rethink what type of expatriates we are going to be having here in the next five to ten years. And it's going to be less of the traditional Western kind."翻译:“我们必须彻底重新思考未来五到十年内我们将拥有什么类型的外籍人士。而且传统的西方类型将会减少。”

($1 = 7.2824 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2824 人民币）

Additional reporting by Casey Hall in Shanghai, Roxanne Liu in Beijing and Dorothy Kam in Hong Kong; Editing by Muralikumar Anantharaman翻译:上海 Casey Hall、北京 Roxanne Liu 和香港 Dorothy Kam 的补充报道；穆拉利库马尔·阿南塔拉曼编辑
